loop-offlinemode-preview: Menu item for previewing offline mode
loop-epubmode-preview: Menu item for previewing epub export
loop-editmode-toogle-on: Menu item for toggling edit mode on
loop-editmode-toogle-off: Menu item for toggling edit mode off
loop-editmode-hint: Hint on items that are only displayed in edit mode
privacy-policy: Link title for privacy policy page
loop-skin-style-vfh: Title for LOOP skinstyle VFH Theme
loop-skin-style-jade: Title for LOOP skinstyle JHS Theme
loop-skin-style-ram: Title for LOOP skinstyle RAM Theme
loop-skin-style-allensbach: Title for LOOP skinstyle AHS Theme
loop-skin-style-ttxtt: Title for LOOP skinstyle TTXTT Theme
loop-no-mainpage-warning: Hint message for creating a TOC/Mainpage (LoopStructure)
loop-audio-unavailable: Message when audio button is clicked but does not work
loop-fr-panel-title: Title of sidebar panel for status info and FlaggedRev options
loop-fr-stable: Tooltip for revision-page-icon on stable pages
loop-fr-olderthanlateststable: Tooltip for revision-page-icon on pages that are older than the latest stable version
loop-fr-newerthanlateststable: Tooltip for revision-page-icon on pages that have unapproved changes from the latest stable version
loop-fr-neverstabilized: Tooltip for revision-page-icon on pages that have never been stabilized
loop-fr-pendingchanges: Tooltip for revision-page-icon on pages that have pending changes after last stabilization
